<p class=3D"MsoNormal" style=3D"MARGIN: 0cm 0cm 0pt; mso-pagination: none; =
mso-layout-grid-align: none"><font face=3D"Times New Roman" size=3D"3">=93G=
raffiti Entertainment is pleased to be the first to bring the work of a fin=

<p c=
lass=3D"MsoNormal" style=3D"MARGIN: 0cm 0cm 0pt; mso-pagination: none; mso-=

<p><font face=3D"Times New Roman" size=3D"3">=A0<=

<p class=3D"MsoNormal" style=3D"MARGIN: 0cm 0cm 0pt; mso-p=
agination: none; mso-layout-grid-align: none"><font face=3D"Times New Roman=
" size=3D"3">Sabarasa, an Argentine developer, is the first Latin American =
company to produce a game for a Nintendo console. To develop <i>Mazes of Fa=
te, </i>Sabarasa has examined several classic RPGs, trying to distill the e=
ssence of what made those games so playable and popular. Using them for ins=
piration, they have crafted an epic RPG that should appeal to new fans and =
hardcore gamers alike.</font></p>

<p class=3D"MsoNormal" style=3D"MARGIN: =
0cm 0cm 0pt; mso-pagination: none; mso-layout-grid-align: none">
<p><font f=
ace=3D"Times New Roman" size=3D"3">=A0</font></p>
</p>

<p class=3D"MsoNorm=
al" style=3D"MARGIN: 5pt 0cm; mso-pagination: none; mso-layout-grid-align: =
none"><font face=3D"Times New Roman" size=3D"3">Dimitri Criona, Graffiti En=
tertainment's Director of Sales, says, "One of the most exciting and s=
table genres for video games is the Role Playing Games category. 'Mazes of =
Fate' for Game Boy Advance provides players a 'traditional' RPG through fif=
ty different levels. There is no question that this game will provide even =
the most avid gamers with many hours of high-quality entertainment." <=
/font></p>

<p class=3D"MsoNormal" style=3D"MARGIN: 0cm 0cm 0pt; mso-pagina=
tion: none; mso-layout-grid-align: none">
<p><font face=3D"Times New Roman"=
 size=3D"3">=A0</font></p>
</p>

<p class=3D"MsoNormal" style=3D"MARGIN: 0c=
m 0cm 0pt; mso-pagination: none; mso-layout-grid-align: none"><font size=3D=
"3"><font face=3D"Times New Roman"><i>Mazes, </i>which has been in developm=
ent since March of 2003, is set in a dark fantasy world that is facing divi=
ne punishment. The ancient gods, disgusted by humanity=92s pride, intend to=
 wipe mankind out and replace it with a new, more submissive race of goatme=
n. One party of adventurers is left to make the ultimate choice. Should the=
y fight back against overwhelming odds, or sentence humanity to a fate that=
 may be worse than death?</font></font></p>

<p class=3D"MsoNormal" style=
=3D"MARGIN: 0cm 0cm 0pt; mso-pagination: none; mso-layout-grid-align: none"=
>
<p><font face=3D"Times New Roman" size=3D"3">=A0</font></p>
</p>

<p clas=
s=3D"MsoNormal" style=3D"MARGIN: 0cm 0cm 0pt; mso-pagination: none; mso-lay=
out-grid-align: none"><font size=3D"3"><font face=3D"Times New Roman"><i>Ma=
zes of Fate </i>spans the length and breadth of a huge, dynamic world, and =
tells an epic story of magic and conspiracy, with more than a hundred chara=
cters you can interact with, an hour of original music featuring thirty-fiv=
e different themes, and twenty-five hours of gameplay.</font></font></p>

<=
p class=3D"MsoNormal" style=3D"MARGIN: 0cm 0cm 0pt; mso-pagination: none; m=
so-layout-grid-align: none">
<p><font face=3D"Times New Roman" size=3D"3">=
=A0</font></p>
</p>

<p class=3D"MsoNormal" style=3D"MARGIN: 0cm 0cm 0pt; m=
so-pagination: none; mso-layout-grid-align: none"><font face=3D"Times New R=
oman" size=3D"3">You will explore dungeons, solve intricate puzzles, and go=
 on multiple quests with a party of up to three adventurers. You can select=
 your protagonist from one of three pre-made characters, or create your own=
, then seek out and recruit six unlockable allies for your crew. The advent=
urers can be customized as you see fit, using nineteen skills, forty magica=
l spells from three different schools of magic, and more than three hundred=
 items and equipment to find and use.</font></p>

<p class=3D"MsoNormal" st=
yle=3D"MARGIN: 0cm 0cm 0pt; mso-pagination: none; mso-layout-grid-align: no=
ne">
<p><font face=3D"Times New Roman" size=3D"3">=A0</font></p>
</p>

<p c=
lass=3D"MsoNormal" style=3D"MARGIN: 0cm 0cm 0pt; mso-pagination: none; mso-=
layout-grid-align: none"><font face=3D"Times New Roman" size=3D"3">You will=
 need all the advantages you can get to overcome hundreds of monsters, unra=
vel the secrets of the gods=92 plot, and battle your way to the point where=
 you must make the Final Decision that will determine the fate of the world=
.</font></p>

nation: none; mso-layout-grid-align: none">

=3D"3"><font face=3D"Times New Roman"><i>Mazes of Fate</i> will ship in fiv=
e languages =96 English, French, Spanish, German, and Italian, which you ca=
n switch between during gameplay using the in-game Options menu =96 when it=
 is released this winter.</font></font></p>
